0: Free upgraded view of the river and city
Room on the 5th floor provided nice view over the river and in typical Mariot decor and furnishings
Lovely room with a good river view
Stayed here for a weekend away we booked the executive room on a high floor with river view
They had a view of the Brisbane River and their room was clean and comfortable
Rooms were clean and well kept as you would expect
Our room was clean and well presented
All staff were helpful and accommodating the meals were excellent and the servicing of the room was first class
To me this is a good classic hotel represents good value and the size of the room is very good
1: We asked what our options were and we were told “ room service ”
The room service menu was extensive
Mine was an Executive King with River View
2: It had a a shower and bathtub in the bathroom and charging plugs at the desk and on both sides of the bed
We went out twice in 2 days and came back to our room after a few hours and found a large pool of water in the bathroom
It ’s disappointing that my room was rarely cleaned up — around two days only for a one week stay
Only downfall was I booked a room for 4 yet our room only had 1 king bed and a lounge
Also had trouble using the phone in the room
Tried to order room service no one ever picked up the phone
We were staying in the king superior room and at 12 at night the alarm from the alarm clock went off and ruined the whole nights sleep
She eventually found us a room but she was really rude about everything
Bathroom lighting needed to have access to brighter light for make up application purposes
